experience.title: Software Developer
recruiter_description: Engineered a 33x throughput increase in malware sandboxing pipeline, scaling from 90 to 3000+ detonated samples daily, resulting in the detection of 14 novel threats across high-profile clients

experience.title: Web Developer

experience.title: Junior Developer
